name: CVE-2019-16167
description: sysstat before 12.1.6 has memory corruption due to an Integer Overflow in remap_struct() in sa_common.c.
pattern: [(software:cpe='cpe:2.3:a:sysstat_project:sysstat:*:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:fedoraproject:fedora:31:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.0:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:opensuse:leap:15.1:*:*:*:*:*:*:*') OR (software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:18.04:*:*:*:lts:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:19.04:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:19.10:*:*:*:*:*:*:*' OR software:cpe='cpe:2.3:o:canonical:ubuntu_linux:16.04:*:*:*:esm:*:*:*')]
